Serpentor:



Serpentor smiled evily, seeing Spears down.  Rolling, he stood up, his knife 
in hand.  Throwing it blade first at Spears' abdomen, he dashed for the 
woods, in the direction of the Newcomer base, hoping to leave before more 
Maximals came.
